embedInstruction1: Biscuits is built to look and feel the way your store needs it. You can activate and edit Biscuits live in your theme editor!
embedInstruction2: Make sure that you pick your desired style for Biscuits while matching your existing branding standards such as your color scheme.
toneBusiness: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you agree to our use of cookies. For more...
tonePersonal: Just letting you know, we use cookies to make your experience on our site as awesome as possible. If you're okay with our delicious cookies...
reviewInstruction: We built Biscuits to empower your brand by instilling trust in the user in their native language. By giving us a review, you can ensure that we can continue to perfect this app. Your review, whether good or bad, will help us a take a step forward in the right direction and thats what matters most. Thank you for giving Biscuits a chance
chatInstruction: You downloaded Biscuits because you care about the customers' trust. Fortify the belief in your brand by providing 24/7 multilingual live chat support. Powered by AI and your real time store data. Try it out for 15 days, free of charge.
feature1: Multilingual cookie & GDPR consent banner based on the viewers location
